author: Nick Collins
comment: Great app love how it's free to make trades. I wish they participated in drips, maybe in the future. Any how if you want to get your feet wet in trading stock use this app. Start with 50 bucks and try to maximize your trade for profits. This app makes it easy to sell and buy stocks. Waiting for the free version of the website but until then will use Robinhood for sure.

Some serious issues including  2fa customer support, customer support bots kept asking for same questions and it took 3 weeks to reset 2fa. Plus funds were withdrawn for the account and showing up in history but are not available. It's been 3 days and support has not come back. Very disappointing.

Not a bad app but I would like like to see more with the interface. Maybe being able to look at a bunch of different stocks that you aren't following instead of having to use a third party to find stocks. Also, the notifications are pretty annoying. I don't need a notification every time a stock moves.

author: Brandon Eddy
comment: The UI is amazing, smooth, and looks great. I use it frequently to check various stocks. The flipside to the streamlined look is less information - I find myself switching to other accounts on other apps to get more information. Also, free trades are definitely a bonus.  It would be amazing to be able to categorize things in the watchlist. Stay strong on the streamlined UI approach, but also find a way to get some detailed information in there.

author: Shaun Hudson
comment: Can't approve my application and blames it on their clearing partner. Says it is a purely technological issue and claims there is no foreseeable solution. Glad they told me that AFTER I referred the app to five people. I'm owed 6 free stocks. Literally took money out of my pocket.

author: Not Enough Guns
comment: So far I think this app is awesome. I bought my first stocks and have used the app to watch my tiny first investments rise, plummet and rise again. Will I get super rich? Well I hope so but either way, I think this app might help.

author: Darrell Watkins
comment: Love it.  I have always wanted to get into stocks but was intimidated.  This app not only makes it super easy for the beginner, it's 100% free! So there is zero reason to not try the stock market.  As for the design of the app, it is very easy to navigate among both stocks you own and stocks you are interested in keeping an eye on.  I do think it lacks a little aesthetically.  It could easily incorporate better charts or grids as well as widgets. However, I feel bad saying anything negative at all about this app, it's free, it's life changing, and it's totally awesome.   If you want to get out of the "hood" start investing in your life, start using Robinhood!

author: mike hawk
comment: I really, really wanted to get into investing for a long time. This app has allowed me to keep my busy life with taking care of my mother and daughter and still figure a way to retire by investing easily and simply. Thank you, whoever created this :)

author: Ariana Valles
comment: The app features are professional stock broker quality. I mean even the pros will use this if they are smart literally no fees and if you trade smart you could become a gold member really fast. I highly recommend the app keep it up you guys

author: Alexander Maxwell
comment: Applied and it just said "application under review" for about 3weeks. I emailed them and they told me I was denied for reasons unknown and to try submitting again later. No reasons for me to get denied and still can't try again.

author: Mary B
comment: Asked via email to cancel this account and a few days later recieved a reply that they'd recieved several request similar to mine, thus a response was delayed. Today, they sent me an email asking me to review how my issue was resolved. I don't even know if the account was cancelled yet!

author: Samuel Dyer
comment: I can't setup account. It pulls up my address, but then says it can't work and that I have to use a different form and then when I put my address in there it says invalid address. Horribly designed if you can't even make an account.

author: Krypt Ography
comment: 1 free stock upon sign up, one free stock to then and you every time someone signs up with valid info. Use the limit buying/selling function and maximize your Return Of Investment or in my case, money from referrals. If you have 5 dollars to invest, you could potentially turn a profit buying and selling at the highs and lows or just invest in a stock you believe in and hope for a good growth over time. Great interface, user friendly, fingerprint sensor compatible for security. I love it.

author: William Rice
comment: Fairly easy to use, constantly trying to build on new features. A little confusing if you know nothing of the stock market

author: Christopher
comment: Wonderful. Perfect and easy without too much confusion. However, once I disabled notifications for a month of no trading. Then when I started again I was unable to re-enable notifications. Had to delete and reinstall.

author: PumkinKiing
comment: I'm loving this app. I like that they give out freebies and don't charge fees, this means that I was able to get started trading without spending any money.

author: Pia Cainglet
comment: So far, I am able to get in. Read that another member could not sign in. Ran into that problem when the email said to use my userid. Tried my email and got in. I was able to sign up through a referral. For those that are enticed by the free stock, don't assume the choices are the most popular ones. I am okay with the one I got. It is the unknown ones that might skyrocket, as I tell myself that (lol). If you are hoping to trade crypto, got a bit of a wait. Until I get full usage, I will hold back one star. Being able to log in, maneuver around, and start investing is the minimum requirement, for me. Anyone wondering about security, fingerprint scan is available. So far, it works on my Note 8.

author: Bryan Slate
comment: If u want to lose thousands of dollars this is the right broker for u,and u always pay a premium on ask price,many stocks are not supported by the app,should be called robingthepoor
I used this app to get into the stock market and Ive been really enjoying it ever since. Its the perfect way to put in a small amount to start off and learn how to trade.

author: Anthony Bacom
comment: This company sucks because they advertised that California is 1 out of 5 states to get access to cryptocurrency during February 2018. The fact that I'm in California and still don't have access yet, is total bs. Their customer service fails to recognize that it is false advertising and won't fix the problem.

author: Donavan White
comment: The app itself is alright, it gets the job done, but one issue I encountered which is annoying, RH issued a free stock for friend share, but then because of the stock they added, it put my account in margin call and put off a day of trading for me. Just be aware this can happen when sharing your code, at the very least a small disclaimer saying this can happen would be nice.

author: Allen Klingsporn
comment: This app would be much better if it would allow me to use the security features that my bank offers for connecting accounts. Having to enter username and password directly is not the current state of technology. You guys need to get with the times!

author: Joseph Sixtos
comment: I like the app, but it doesn't show penny saver stocks and it doesn't explain what certain types of things are. Like order type. Overall good but ehh

author: Derrick Harris
comment: Great app for experienced and novice investors. Easy to navigate. You can nip pick a few things but no broker fees more than makes up for that.

author: Yoav Gray
comment: As an Android developer, I'm very impressed by this app. It's very slick and has cool UI features, and very good UX. Great job!

author: Mark Jennings
comment: Easy to use and with the basic functionality to make schedule buys/sells. Also has a great interface for viewing stocks you own and stocks you're watching.

author: Eric Talman
comment: Been using it for 3 years and I'm very happy with the app and service. I hope they add crypto and web ui soon.

author: Spencer Calsbeck
comment: Simple. Instant gratification. Allows you to do a little research before making blind guesses. Fun to watch your money grow!

author: Rafael Defendini
comment: Simple, free and easy to use app to buy stocks and ETFs.  It can be used to create a post tax porfolio.

author: camokazi1313
comment: Great app but how long will it take for them to implement crypto? I've been on the "list" for over a month now.

author: Steven Wohlschlag
comment: Wanted to do this for a long time and enjoying the potential for growth even with only a small investment to start.

author: David Percifield
comment: I am just getting back into Trading. Using Robinhood to do single share trades while I  work out my system and it is a great program.  Easy to use.

author: Jesse Nolen
comment: Love app can't wait til more stocks are available so I can just use this one for trading .

Easy to use. Great so far. Simple way to buy stocks for those of us not buying $1000 worth at a time. Combining this with the free research tools out there gives you a pretty good way to get into the markets.

author: pratik babariya
comment: I think, delay in transaction from bank to Robinhood account vice versa. Usually ACH not taking that much time

author: Nic Fle
comment: I like it just too detail for me at this point  but that is what I've been looking for just got to figure it out

author: Lori Boggio
comment: I just don't know yet? We well see. Trying it out 28 days now haven't sold yet or just keep it ? ??? Idk?

author: Roman Rocha
comment: This app so far has been easy to use and very informative.  I really like the articles and brief summary of the stock I'm interested in.  Great app!

author: Raynard Rogers
comment: Like everything about it. Now come up with the same product to invest in NASDAQ

author: Aravinth Bheemaraj
comment: Very simple to track & use. Eagerly awaiting for the crypto support..
